label: Submit documentation of completion of training to COR
quote: documentation of completion of training must be submitted to the COR.

label: Contractor employees and subcontractors must annually complete training during transition period of option year
quote: Each contractor employee and subcontractor must annually complete this training during the transition period of the option year.

label: Contractor employees or subcontractors who did not complete training are prohibited from performing work related to SOW
quote: Any contractor employee or subcontractor who did not complete this training will not be allowed to perform work related to this SOW.

label: Contractor must accredit information system to HHM FIPS level when handling Sensitive PII data on behalf of CBP
quote: the contractor will Accredit (ATO) this information system to the (HHM) FIPS level

label: All hardware, software, and services must be compliant with DHS 4300A Policy Directive (Version 13.3, February 13, 2023)
quote: All hardware, software, and services provided under this task order must be compliant with DHS 4300A Policy Directive (Version 13.3, February 13, 2023).

label: Encryption must use FIPS 197 AES 256 algorithm and FIPS 140-2 validated cryptographic modules
quote: FIPS 197 (Advanced Encryption Standard (AES)) 256 algorithm and cryptographic modules that have been validated under FIPS 140-2.

label: Encryption must use NSA Type 2 or Type 1 encryption
quote: National Security Agency (NSA) Type 2 or Type 1 encryption.

label: Encryption must use Public Key Infrastructure as per DHS 4300A Policy Directive attachment U
quote: Public Key Infrastructure (PKI) (please see DHS 4300A Policy Directive (Version 13.3, February 13, 2023) attachment U).

label: Contractor shall afford DHS and oversight organizations access to facilities, installations, operations, documentation, databases and personnel for security reviews
quote: The Contractor shall afford DHS, including the organization of the DHS Office of the Chief Information Officer, the Office of the Inspector General, authorized Contracting Officer’s Technical Representative (COTR), and other government oversight organizations, access to the Contractor’s facilities, installations, operations, documentation, databases and personnel used in the performance of this contract.

label: Contractor will contact DHS Chief Information Security Officer to coordinate and participate in review and inspection activity of government oversight organizations external to DHS
quote: The Contractor will contact the DHS Chief Information Security Officer to coordinate and participate in the review and inspection activity of government oversight organizations external to the DHS.
